snippet.title: Mirth Island Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Mirth Island is a heartwarming adventure game that follows the story of a young duck who's tired of feeling sad and decides to take matters into his own hands. With a dream in his heart and a rickety boat beneath his feet, he embarks on a journey to an odd island, where happiness is said to bloom like wildflowers. Along the way, he'll face challenges, make new friends, and discover the true meaning of happiness. With its captivating storyline, charming visuals, and wholesome gameplay, Mirth Island is a game that will tug at your heartstrings and leave you feeling uplifted.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2410360/Mirth_Island/
